- Location: Ceiling near wall/ceiling corner inside room.
- Material: Painted plaster/drywall ceiling.
- Observations: Multiple cracks with flaking/peeling paint, centered area with a larger crack.
- Implication: Possible settlement or movement; moisture intrusion cannot be ruled out without further inspection.
- Recommended action: Inspect attic/roof/plumbing for leaks; monitor for progression; repair cracks with joint compound and repaint if no moisture present.
